title: screenshot
description: Takes a screenshot in PNG format.

anyOf.title: Capture screenshot
anyOf.description: If `true`, captures a screenshot. If `false`, doesn't capture a screenshot.

path.title: Screenshot (simple)
path.description: File path of the PNG file. Accepts absolute paths. If not specified, the file name is the ID of the step.

directory.description: Directory of the PNG file. If the directory doesn't exist, creates the directory.

maxVariation.description: Allowed variation in percentage of pixels between the new screenshot and the existing screenshot at `path`. If the difference between the new screenshot and the existing screenshot is greater than `maxVariation`, the step fails. If a screenshot doesn't exist at `path`, this value is ignored.

overwrite.description:
If `true`, overwrites the existing screenshot at `path` if it exists.
If `aboveVariation`, overwrites the existing screenshot at `path` if the difference between the new screenshot and the existing screenshot is greater than `maxVariation`.

anyOf.title: Crop by element (simple)
anyOf.description: Display text or selector of the element to screenshot.

sourceIntegration.description: Information about the source integration for this screenshot, enabling upload of changed files back to the source CMS. Set automatically during test resolution for files from integrations.

crop_element.title: Crop by element (detailed)
crop_element.description: Crop the screenshot to a specific element.

elementText.description: Display text of the element to screenshot.

selector.description: Selector of the element to screenshot.

elementId.description: ID attribute of the element to find. Supports exact match or regex pattern using /pattern/ syntax.

elementTestId.description: data-testid attribute of the element to find. Supports exact match or regex pattern using /pattern/ syntax.

elementClass.description: Class or array of classes that the element must have. Each class supports exact match or regex pattern using /pattern/ syntax. Element must have all specified classes.

elementAttribute.description: Object of attribute key-value pairs that the element must have. Values can be strings (supporting /pattern/ regex), numbers, or booleans. Boolean true matches attribute presence, false matches absence.

elementAria.description: Computed accessible name of the element per ARIA specification. Supports exact match or regex pattern using /pattern/ syntax.

anyOf.title: Padding (simple)
anyOf.description: Padding in pixels to add to the bounds of the element.

padding.title: Padding (detailed)
padding.description: Padding in pixels to add to the bounds of the element.
